help-file.title: "ECTOPLASMIC FORM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: N/A Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster. Type of spell: Enchantment
This enchantment converts the body of the caster to an astral substance known as 'ectoplasm'. This substance is not visible to most beings without the aid of other magical cantrips.
